Skip to main content Skip to footer The Long Island Cafe of SC est. 1986 Since first opening its doors in 1986, Long Island Café has been a hidden gem for locals and tourists alike, tucked within a strip mall on the Isle of Palms. Over its decades-long history, this beloved restaurant has become a staple of the Charleston community. Location 1515 Palm Blvd.Isle of Palms, SC (843) 886-8809 Hours of Operation Lunch Monday — Saturday11:00am — 2:00pm Brunch Sunday11:00am — 2:00pm Dinner Monday — Sunday5:00pm — until IOP Raw Monday — Sunday4:30pm — until rESERVATIONS Reservations are prioritized due to high demand, particularly on weekends.Fill out the form to secure your spot. Menus In 2012, the café underwent a revitalization with new ownership, breathing new life into the restaurant and menu. In 2019, the vision for the island’s finest seafood expanded as a sister location, IOP Raw, was opened right next door. Both restaurants were sold to longtime friends and loyal patrons in 2022. Though the menu has evolved through all the transitions, classic dishes remain, with a continued emphasis on fresh, local seafood. New items and regularly changing specials keep the offerings vibrant. This modern version of an island favorite has thrived, supporting local producers while serving up a diverse menu of seafood, pasta, American cuisine, and desserts. Sharing a kitchen allows guests to enjoy both menus in either dining room. Long Island Cafe Menu Lunch Dinner Brunch Drinks Kid's Menu Steamers FAQs What are you known for? We are known for our iconic fried seafood platters, fresh oysters, and our wildly popular Seafood Steamer Buckets. Guests love our coastal flavors, relaxed island atmosphere, and long-standing reputation as one of Isle of Palms’ favorite seafood destinations. What meals do you serve? We serve lunch and dinner daily, as well as a beloved Sunday brunch featuring coastal classics and island-inspired favorites. Do you offer delivery or takeout? Yes! We offer takeout and delivery, and highly recommend our Seafood Steamer Buckets for beach days, family gatherings, holidays, and at-home events. What areas do you serve? We proudly serve Isle of Palms, South Carolina, along with nearby beach communities. Are reservations required? Reservations are not required, but highly recommended, especially for weekends, holidays, and larger parties. Is there a dress code? No—island casual attire is perfectly welcome. Come as you are and enjoy fresh, local seafood by the coast. Now offering LIC Steamers! Making dinner as easy as 1-2-3 with L-I-C! Perfect for a solo feast, or a big celebration! Order Online View Menu

Order Takeout & Delivery Online View Heating Instructions Download Lunch Dinner Brunch Drinks Kid's Menu Steamers 55 ISLE OF PALMS STEAMER - ebb tide *perfect for 2* 1 lb Peel and Eat Shrimp, 1/2 Pound Jalapeño Cheddar Sausage, Sweet Corn, Red Bliss Potatoes, classic or cajun seasoning, cocktail sauce, and butter 100 ISLE OF PALMS STEAMER - high water *serves 4-5* 2 1/2 lbs Peel and Eat Shrimp, 1 lb Jalapeño Cheddar Sausage, Sweet Corn, Red Bliss Potatoes, classic or cajun seasoning, cocktail sauce, and butter 90 SULLIVANS STEAMER - ebb tide *serves 2-3* 1 lb Snow Crab, 1 lb Peel and Eat Shrimp, Sweet Corn, Red Bliss Potatoes, classic or cajun seasoning, cocktail sauce, and butter 150 SULLIVANS STEAMER - high water *serves 4-5* 2 lbs Snow Crabs, 2 lbs Peel and Eat Shrimp, Sweet Corn, Red Bliss Potatoes, classic or cajun seasoning, cocktail sauce, and butter 105 FOLLY STEAMER - ebb tide *serves 3-4* 1 lb Peel and Eat Shrimp, 1 Dozen Clams, 1 lb Snow Crab, 1/2 lb Jalapeño Cheddar Sausage, Sweet Corn, Red Bliss Potatoes, classic or cajun seasoning, cocktail sauce, and butter 210 FOLLY STEAMER - high water *serves 5-6* 2 lbs Peel and Eat Shrimp, 2 Dozen Clams, 2 lbs. Snow Crab, 1 lb Jalapeño Cheddar Sausage, Sweet Corn, Red Bliss Potatoes, classic or cajun seasoning, cocktail sauce, and butter 150 FORT MOULTRIE STEAMER - ebb tide *serves 3-4* 1 lb Snow Crab, two 5 oz Lobster Tails, 1 Dozen Clams, 1 lb Peel and Eat Shrimp, 1/2 lb Jalapeño Cheddar Sausage, Sweet Corn, Red Bliss Potatoes, classic or cajun seasoning, cocktail sauce, and butter 250 FORT MOULTRIE STEAMER - high water *serves 5-6* 2 lbs Snow Crab, four 5 oz Lobster Tails, 2 Dozen Clams, 1 1/2 lb Peel and Eat Shrimp,1 lb Jalapeño Cheddar Sausage, Sweet Corn, Red Bliss Potatoes, classic or cajun seasoning, cocktail sauce, and butter ADD ONS Add on to the above buckets for some extra eats, or build your own bucket starting with a BYOB!Call to find out about our Party Buckets for 20 or 30 guests or more!All BYOB come with sweet corn, red bliss potatoes, cajun or classic seasoning, cocktail sauce, and butter(enough for 2-3, please add each item accordingly) +10 1 LB CORN & 1 LB POTATOES +25 OYSTERS 1 DOZEN +45 OYSTERS 2 DOZEN +30 SNOW CRAB 1 POUND +60 SNOW CRAB 2 POUNDS +90 SNOW CRAB 3 POUNDS +25 LOBSTER TAIL (5oz) +25 PEEL & EAT SHRIMP 1 LB +50 PEEL & EAT SHRIMP 2 LBS +75 PEEL & EAT SHRIMP 3 LBS +5 JALAPEÑO CHEDDAR SAUSAGE LINK +2 EXTRA COCKTAIL SAUCE (8oz) +12 6 PACK MILLER LITE +60 WHOLE KEY LIME OR PECAN PIE Consuming raw or undercooked meats, poultry, seafood, shellfish or eggs may increase your risk of foodborne illness. Young children, the elderly or anyone whose health is compromised should not consume undercooked seafood, meats and shellfish. 18% gratuity will be added to parties of 8 or more.*Contains ingredients that are raw or undercooked.Menu items are subject to change according to seasonality and availability. Heat & Eat Instructions refrigerate pot until ready to cook. open your pot, remove bagged seafood (shrimp, clams) and place in refrigerator pour in 2 cups of water or your favorite beer (2.5 cups for electric coil cooktops) replace lid (not too tight) place your pot on largest burner. Gas Burner – cook on medium high for 30 minutes Glass Cooktop – cook on high for 40 minutes. Electric Coil Cooktop – cook on medium for 35 minutes. remove seafood from packaging. carefully remove lid (with pot holders) and add the seafood. add additional seasoning. replace lid (not too tight) steam for an additional 7 to 9 minutes (if shrimp are not all pink, stir them and steam for an additional 2 to 4 minutes) remove pot from heat (be careful – it’s HOT), carefully remove lid. drain. serve on your favorite platter or spread out some paper, empty on the table (foil under the paper will protect your table!), gather round, and enjoy! Now offering LIC Steamers! Making dinner as easy as 1-2-3 with L-I-C! Perfect for a solo feast, or a big celebration! Order Online View Menu
